entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is a character in the story who expresses shock and concern about Ginny being possessed by You-Know-Who. He asks if Ginny has been enchanted by You-Know-Who.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry quickly picks up the diary and shows it to Dumbledore, explaining that Riddle wrote it when he was sixteen.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore takes the diary from Harry and examines its burnt and soggy pages. He comments on Tom Riddle's brilliance and his past as a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned by Mr Weasley as being potentially enchanted by You-Know-Who.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is revealed to be the past identity of Tom Riddle, who was a student at Hogwarts fifty years ago.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as the past identity of Lord Voldemort, who was a brilliant student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as possessing Ginny and being the subject of concern for Mr Weasley.

relationships.description: Dumbledore taught Tom Riddle fifty years ago at Hogwarts.
Harry quickly picks up the diary and shows it to Dumbledore.
